org.microbean.helm.maven

Class UpdateReleaseMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo
              • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractForceableMutatingReleaseMojo
                • org.microbean.helm.maven.UpdateReleaseMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="update")
public class UpdateReleaseMojo
extends AbstractForceableMutatingReleaseMojo
    Updates a release with a new chart.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

      Returns true if, during the update, values should be reset to the values built in to the new chart.

      Returns true if, during the update, any new values should be merged with those present in the prior version of the release being updated.

      • UpdateReleaseMojo

        @Inject
public UpdateReleaseMojo(MavenProject project,
                                 MavenSession session)
        Creates a new UpdateReleaseMojo.
        Parameters:
        project - the MavenProject in effect; must not be null
        session - the MavenSession in effect; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either project or session is null

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation updates the release named by the supplied release name with a new chart residing at the indicated URL.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • getChartUrl

        public URL getChartUrl()
        Returns a URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method.

        This method may return null.

        Returns:
        a URL to a Helm chart, or null
        See Also:
        setChartUrl(URL)

      • setChartUrl

        public void setChartUrl(URL chartUrl)
        Sets the URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method.
        Parameters:
        chartUrl - the URL identifying a Helm chart that can be read by the AbstractChartLoader produced by the createChartLoader() method; may be null

      • getResetValues

        public boolean getResetValues()
        Returns true if, during the update, values should be reset to the values built in to the new chart.
        Returns:
        true if, during the update, values should be reset to the values built in to the new chart; false otherwise
        See Also:
        setResetValues(boolean)

      • setResetValues

        public void setResetValues(boolean resetValues)
        Sets whether, during the update, values should be reset to the values built in to the new chart.
        Parameters:
        resetValues - if true, during the update values will be reset to the values built in to the new chart
        See Also:
        getResetValues()

      • getReuseValues

        public boolean getReuseValues()
        Returns true if, during the update, any new values should be merged with those present in the prior version of the release being updated.
        Returns:
        true if, during the update, any new values should be merged with those present in the prior version of the release being updated; false otherwise
        See Also:
        setReuseValues(boolean)

      • setReuseValues

        public void setReuseValues(boolean reuseValues)
        Sets whether, during the update, any new values should be merged with those present in the prior version of the release being updated.
        Parameters:
        reuseValues - if true during the update any new values will be merged with those present in the prior version of the release being updated
        See Also:
        getReuseValues()

      • getValuesYaml

        public String getValuesYaml()
        Returns a YAML String representing the values to use to customize the update.

        This method may return null.

        Overrides of this method may return null.

        Returns:
        a YAML String representing the values to use to customize the update, or null
        See Also:
        setValuesYaml(String)

      • createChartLoader

        protected AbstractChartLoader<URL> createChartLoader()
        Creates and returns an AbstractChartLoader capable of loading a Helm chart from a URL.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        This implementation returns a new URLChartLoader.

        Returns:
        a new AbstractChartLoader implementation; never null
